name: Amfissa Olive Oil
details: Using the website users can buy olive oils from farms
Users can see the order details under the dashboard, status, and cancel orders.
Admin can manage products and orders from the admin dashboard.
Admin can add new product from admin dashboard
User can write review from user dashboard

name: GTour travel Website
details: Tour packages for a user to book on a specific date.
Managing the booking from the user dashboard and seeing the booking status.
All tour packages and booked are managed from the admin dashboard.
Admin can add new destinantion from backend dashboard
New tour package can be published from admin dashboard

name: Dinis Health Care
details: Developed a health care hospital website with a doctor's appointment.
Take appointments online by signing in using google or simple email registration.
Showing doctors details for taking the appointments
User need to sign in for take appointment
Google sign in can be completed by clicking google sign in
